name: Two Left Feet
description:
*Use fullscreen for best experiance*

You play as an old pair of shoes who found themselfs in a world of wonder and chaos after they got thrown away by the stores owner.

Controls
Mouse to Move,
R to Restart from last checkpoint,
Esc to Quit.

all the assets were made by us during the game jam, exept the button sfx:
https://freesound.org/people/jrssandoval/sounds/67132/
